Get 3 Words¶

astro3words.coords_to_words(ra: float, dec: float) → str¶

Given RA, Dec of the object, return its “What 3 words” coordinate string.

Parameters

  • ra (float) – Right Ascension of the object [degrees]

  • dec (float) – Declination of the object [degrees]

Returns

3-word string delimited by periods corresponding to this coordinate.

Return type

str

astro3words.words_to_coords(words: str) → tuple¶

Given three words, return the RA and dec coordinates of an object.

Parameters

words (str) – a string in the format “word1.word2.word3”

Returns

Right ascension and declination of the object

Return type

tuple(float, float)
